songs.title: P.Y.P.
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1:]
Play your part, love
Shawty wanted to be a dancer
I whipped out the camera
And said fuck the small talk, sugar
(Fuck the small talk)
Body moving to the break beat
Dirty dancing to the JBs

[Hook:]
Baby girl you better not dance with none of these other niggas
The way you dance with me

[Verse 2:]
Shoulda seen her
I don't want to let her go too soon
(Too soon)
But I'll be damned if I spent all this loot on you
It's true
Hard work in a small place.
(Small place)
Hundred dollars make it all change

[Chorus:]
Baby girl, you better not dance with none of these other niggas
The way you dance with-

[Bridge:]
Play! (Play)
(Your part)
You better play your part
(Your part)
Shawty you gots to play your place
Play! Yeah. (yeah)
(Your part)
Play your part
(Your part)
Baby, you better play your place

[Hook:]
Baby girl, you better not dance none of these other niggas
The way you dance with me, me, me, me

[Verse 3]
Go, go, go
(I don't want to go)
Go, go, go
(I don't want to go)
Go, go, go
(I don't want to go)
Go, go, go
(I don't want to go)
Pretty pigtail, big hips, big lips
Far from a pig in the cell, your figure on hit
Freaky figs coming from a tree
Get a pick, get in place while you can
Get a taste for the lick
Honey, honey, honey flowing down your dress
I live in your nest
Stay doing what's best for the team
Putting in reps while putting in wraps
You taking them shots to the chest my seed
My seed, My seed
